item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 09 Jan 2024
item.description:
1. Odoc module index bookmarklet
  2. create-melange-app 1.0.0 - A CLI for quickly becoming productive with Melange
  3. What's possible with Melange
  4. Ocaml-ts-mode - Emacs ocaml major mode using tree sitter
  5. Using Menhir to parse into idiomatic JS (TypeScript) structures
  6. Play with project-wide occurrences for OCaml!
  7. New release of Menhir (20231231)
  8. Ocsigen: summary of recent releases
  9. sarif 0.1.0 - Static Analysis Results Interchange Format (SARIF) For OCaml
  10. Other OCaml News
